name: test_e2e_with_logs[295_SSTI_SMARTY_001]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SSTI_SMARTY_001` |
| **Name** | Smarty PHP code execution |
| **Category** | SSTI |
| **Subcategory** | smarty |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `{php}system("id");{/php}`
- **Encoded**: `%7Bphp%7Dsystem(%22id%22)%3B%7B%2Fphp%7D`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~9000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:40:14.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SSTI] Server-Side Template Injection detected test_id=SSTI_SMARTY_001-1767850814573-3nc5dk pattern_id=SSTI_SMARTY_001 uri=/?q=%7Bphp%7Dsystem(%22id%22)%3B%7B%2Fphp%7D client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
05:40:14.000000000: Critical [NGINX SSTI] Server-Side Template Injection detected test_id=SSTI_SMARTY_001-1767850814573-3nc5dk pattern_id=SSTI_SMARTY_001 uri=/?q=%7Bphp%7Dsystem(%22id%22)%3B%7B%2Fphp%7D client=127.0.0.1
```
